title: 1948 Allan Cup
text:
The 1948 <a href="Allan%20Cup">Allan Cup</a> was the <a href="Canada">Canadian</a> national <a href="senior%20ice%20hockey">senior ice hockey</a> championship for the 1947-48 Senior season. 
Final.
Best of 7
<a href="Edmonton%20Flyers">Edmonton Flyers</a> beat <a href="Ottawa%20Senators%20%28senior%20hockey%29">Ottawa Senators</a> 4-1 on series.
